name: GKInvite
desc: An invitation to join a match sent to the local player from another player.

items.name: var sender: GKPlayer
items.desc: The player who sends the invitation.

items.name: var playerAttributes: UInt32
items.desc: The player attributes for the match.

items.name: var playerGroup: Int
items.desc: The player group for the match.

items.name: var isHosted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you host the game on your own servers.
